items.name: Lenovo ThinkPad P50 Mobile Workstation Laptop - Windows 10 Pro - Intel i7-6820HQ, 64GB RAM, 1TB SSD + 1TB HDD, 15.6" 4K UHD IPS (3840x2160) Display, NVIDIA Quadro M2000M, Pantone Color Sensor
items.shortDescription: "Intel Core i7-6820HQ (6M Cache, up to 3.6 GHz) - 1TB M.2 NGFF Solid State Drive + 1TB Hard Disk Drive - 64GB PC4-17000 DDR4 SDRAM, 2133MHz SODIMM - Pantone Color Sensor - 15.6"" UHD (3840x2160) Anti-Glare, Non-Touch Display - NVIDIA Quadro M2000M"
items.longDescription: <br><b>Lenovo ThinkPad P50: Redefining Power in a 15.6" Mobile Workstation</b><br><br>The ThinkPad P50 is your mobile option for true, workstation-level performance. From 3D rendering to enhanced multitasking, the P50 gives you the power you need without the bulk. What's more, it's ISV-certified with over 100 apps, and features an expansive selection of ports and displays.<br><br><b>Powerful Processor</b><br><br>Enhanced processors deliver the performance to increase productivity for your business. You can multitask quickly, move effortlessly between applications, and collaborate wirelessly in a high quality videoconference — all with the convenience of longer battery life. Plus, you can guard against identity theft and ensure safe access to your network with built-in security features.<br><br><b>Award-Winning Keyboard</b><br><br>Full-sized and spill-resistant, the legendary ThinkPad ergonomic keyboard is renowned for its full array of keys, excellent feel, and TrackPoint pointing device. And it's optimised for modern operating systems.<br><br><b>Key Specifications:</b><br><br>- Intel Core i7-6820HQ Processor (6M Cache, up to 3.6 GHz)<br>- Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Fingerprint Reader<br>- 15.6" 4K UHD IPS (3840 x 2160) Anti-Glare, Non-Touch Display<br>- 1TB M.2 NGFF Solid State Drive + 1TB Hard Disk Drive - 64GB DDR4 RAM, 2133 MHz<br>- NVIDIA Quadro M2000M Graphics with 4GB VRAM<br>- Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8260, Bluetooth Version 4.1<br>- 720p HD Webcam with Dual Array Microphone, Pantone Color Sensor<br>- Backlit, Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Full Number Pad<br>- I/O Ports: 4x USB 3.0 ports (one Always On), HDMI, mini-DisplayPort, Ethernet (RJ-45), USB Type-C / Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 card Reader, Dock Connector<br>- Mil-Spec Test: MIL-STD-810G military certification | Environmental: EPEAT Gold; ENERGY STAR 6.1; GREENGUARD; RoHS-compliant

items.name: Asus ROG Strix GL702VI-WB74 Metallic Copper 17.3" FHD 120Hz G-SYNC Intel Core i7-7700HQ 16GB RAM 256GB NVMe SSD +1TB 5400rpm HDD NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 8GB Graphics Win10 1YW/1ADP Gaming Notebook
items.shortDescription: ROG Strix GL702VI is the gaming laptop that packs everything you need to win, including NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 graphics, Windows 10 Pro, the latest 7th Generation Intel Core i7 processor, and a tremendous 120Hz G-SYNC panel. Loaded with premium components and styled to impress, ROG Strix GL702 is the all-conquering companion for every gaming adventure!
items.longDescription: <ul><li>UNBEATABLE PERFORMANCE Experience unbeatable performance with a 7th Generation Intel Core i7 quad-core processor and discrete NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 graphics, with Microsoft DirectX 12 support — plus NVMe PCIe x4 for blazingly fast SSD data transfers. This powerful combination delivers everything you need for today‘s fast-paced games and for multitasking!</li><li>STUNNING 120HZ WIDE-VIEW PANEL WITH NVIDIA G-SYNC The super-fast 120Hz wide-view panel on the Strix GL702 includes NVIDIA G-SYNC technology for synchronizing refresh rates with its awesome GTX 1080 graphics card. This eliminates visual tearing and drastically reduces lag and frame stutter to deliver smooth and fast gaming graphics — without affecting system performance!</li><li>CUSTOMIZABLE AURA RGB KEYBOARD Strix GL702 is equipped with a four-zone, Aura RGB-backlit keyboard with chiclet-style keys and a demarcated WASD group for fast, accurate control — even in the dark. With seemingly endless colors, keyboard lighting can be fully customized to suit your personality. And these keys don't just look good: The refined aesthetic is backed by precisely engineered scissor switches with 1.8mm travel, for keystrokes that feel great and hit their mark, every time!</li><li>ULTRAFAST STORAGE NVM Express PCIe 3.0 x4 enables superfast data access speeds, so you'll spend less time waiting and more time gaming! Through clever optimization of hardware and software, Strix GL702 with an NVMe SSD provides extreme read speeds of up to 3000MB/s. That's up to 4.3X faster than PCIe x2 and an astonishing up to 35X faster than traditional hard drives!</li><li>UP TO 32GB OF DDR4 Strix GL702 is fitted with up to 32GB of DDR4 RAM — the latest and fastest PC memory. The high speed, large capacity and lower power consumption of DDR4 will seriously boost your Strix GL702 gaming experiences!</li><li>POWERFUL THERMAL DESIGN Strix GL702 uses heat pipes and a dual fan system to cool the CPU and GPU independently. The pair of 12V fans increase air flow through the chassis by 35%, and maximize cooling efficiency to provide stability for intense gaming marathons with GTX 1080 graphics.</li><li>FULL VR SUPPORT The VR-ready NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 GPU in the Strix GL702 drives demanding virtual-reality games with great speed, supreme smoothness and without stutter — immersing you convincingly in an infinite number of other worlds.</li><li>BOOST SPEAKER VOLUME UP TO 200% Strix GL702 includes stereo speakers that are carefully engineered and arranged to deliver crisp, clear and powerful audio. Built-in smart-amplifier technology monitors audio output and makes real-time adjustments, so you can pump the volume up to the max without worrying about damaging the cones.</li><li>SONIC STUDIO III AND SONIC RADAR III Strix GL702 also includes Sonic Studio software, with in-game noise cancellation, voice-volume stabilization, and Sonic Radar — an innovative on-screen overlay that helps you detect opponents by displaying the relative positions of gunshots, footsteps and other in-game sound effects!</li><li>CONVENIENT CONNECTIVITY Strix GL702 is stacked with great connectivity, including a Mini DisplayPort - a small, simple connector that makes it quick and easy to attach a larger external monitor for even more gaming immersion. We've placed most of the ports on Strix GL702 on the left-hand side, keeping the space on the right free for those frantic in-game mouse actions! FILTER OUT ALL AMBIENT NOISE Integrated array microphones filter out ambient noise — So even if you're at a LAN party or in another loud environment, your voice will come through loud and clear.</li><li>ROG GAMING CENTER ROG Gaming Center allows you to launch ROG applications and easily access settings. Strix GL702 also includes GameFirst IV technology to optimize network traffic for faster, lag-free online gaming.</li><li>Card Reader Multi-format card reader (SD/MMC)</li><li>WebCam HD Web Camera</li><li>Networking Wi-Fi Integrated 802.11 AC (2x2) 10/100/1000 Base T Bluetooth Built-in Bluetooth V4.1</li><li>Interface 1 x Microphone-in/Headphone-out jack 1 x Type C USB3.0 (USB3.1 GEN1) 3 x USB 3.0 port(s) Type A 1 x HDMI 1 x mini Display Port 1 x SD card reader</li><li>Battery 8 Cells 88 Whrs Battery</li><li>NVIDIA GTX1080 8GB GDDR5</li><li>CPU Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8GHz (Turbo up to 3.8GHz)</li><li>HDD 1TB (5400 RPM) + 256GB PCIE G3x4 NVME SSD</li></ul>

items.longDescription: <b>Lenovo ThinkPad P51: Redefining Power in a 15.6" Mobile Workstation</b><br><br>The ThinkPad P51 is your mobile option for true, workstation-level performance. From 3D rendering to enhanced multitasking, the P51 gives you the power you need without the bulk. What's more, it's ISV-certified with over 100 apps, and features an expansive selection of ports and displays.<br><br><b>Powerful Processor</b><br><br>Enhanced processors deliver the performance to increase productivity for your business. You can multitask quickly, move effortlessly between applications, and collaborate wirelessly in a high quality videoconference — all with the convenience of longer battery life. Plus, you can guard against identity theft and ensure safe access to your network with built-in security features.<br><br><b>Award-Winning Keyboard</b><br><br>Full-sized and spill-resistant, the legendary ThinkPad ergonomic keyboard is renowned for its full array of keys, excellent feel, and TrackPoint pointing device. And it's optimised for modern operating systems.<br><br><b>Key Specifications:</b><br><br>- Intel Xeon E3-1505M v6 Processor (8M Cache, up to 4.0 GHz)<br>- Windows 7 Pro 64-bit, Fingerprint Reader<br>- 15.6" Full HD IPS (1920 x 1080) Anti-Glare, Non-Touch Display<br>- 4TB SSD - 32GB DDR4 Error-correcting code (ECC) RAM, 2400 MHz<br>- NVIDIA Quadro M2200M Graphics with 4GB VRAM<br>- Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8265, Bluetooth Version 4.1<br>- 720p HD Webcam with Dual Array Microphone, Smart Card Reader<br>- Backlit, Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Full Number Pad<br>- I/O Ports: 4x USB 3.1 ports (one Always On), HDMI 1.4b, mini-DisplayPort 1.2a, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet (RJ-45), USB Type-C / Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 card Reader (SD/SDHC/SDXC), Dock Connector<br>- Mil-Spec Test: MIL-STD-810G military certification | Environmental: EPEAT Gold; ENERGY STAR 6.1; GREENGUARD; RoHS-compliant

items.name: Lenovo ThinkPad P51s Mobile Workstation Laptop - Windows 7 Pro, Core i7-7500U, 32GB RAM, 4TB SSD, 15.6" FHD 1080p IPS Display, NVIDIA Quadro M520M, Backlit Keyboard, Fingerprint, AC Wi-Fi
items.shortDescription: "Intel Core i7-7500U (4M Cache, up to 3.5GHz) - 4TB Solid State Drive - 32GB PC3-12800 DDR4L SDRAM, 2400MHz SODIMM - 15.6"" Full HD (1920x1080) Anti-Glare (Matte) IPS Display - NVIDIA Quadro M520M Discrete Graphics with 2GB VRAM - Stereo Speakers, Fingerprint Reader Reader"
items.longDescription: <b>Lenovo ThinkPad P51s: Workstation Power Meets Ultrabook Mobility</b><br><br>Get the job done with powerful, cutting-edge processing, great battery life, and rugged construction paired with high-resolution video with discrete graphics, multi-port flexibility, and business-class security. All that while being even thinner and lighter than the previous generation.<br><br><b>Powerful Processor</b><br><br>PC performance has never been faster. Intel 7th Gen Core i processors with built-in security are designed to take your productivity, creativity, and 3D gaming to the next level. So you can get more done right from the start.<br><br><b>Vivid Visuals</b><br><br>With its advanced architecture and 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM, the ISV-certified NVIDIA Maxwell M520M GPU has the perfect balance of power and battery life - enabling you to be in the field and still get your work done. The extra bright display boasts anti-glare technology and in-plane switching for near-180 degree wide-angle viewing. Add the 720p HD webcam so you can join web conferences and video chats like you're really there.<br><br><b>Key Specifications:</b><br><br>- Intel Core i7-7500U Processor (4M Cache, up to 3.5 GHz)<br>- Windows 7 Pro 64-bit<br>- 15.6" IPS Full HD (1920 x 1080) Non-Touch, Anti-Glare Display<br>- 4TB Solid State Drive - 32GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz<br>- NVIDIA Quadro M520M Discrete Graphics w/ 2GB VRAM<br>- Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8265, Bluetooth Version 4.1 (No vPro)<br>- 720p HD Webcam with Mic<br>- Stereo Speakers, Fingerprint Reader<br>- Backlit Keyboard with NumberPad and TrackPoint (Pointing Stick)<br>- I/O Ports: USB-C with Intel Thunderbolt3, 3x USB 3.1 ports (1 Always-on charging), HDMI 1.4b , 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet (RJ-45), Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 Card Reader, Dock Connector / 65-Watt USB Type-C AC-Adapter / 4-Cell Li-Polymer (32Wh) Internal Battery + 3-Cell Li-Ion (24Wh) External (Removable) Battery

items.longDescription: <b>Lenovo ThinkPad P51s: Workstation Power Meets Ultrabook Mobility</b><br><br>Get the job done with powerful, cutting-edge processing, great battery life, and rugged construction paired with high-resolution video with discrete graphics, multi-port flexibility, and business-class security. All that while being even thinner and lighter than the previous generation.<br><br><b>Powerful Processor</b><br><br>PC performance has never been faster. Intel 7th Gen Core i processors with built-in security are designed to take your productivity, creativity, and 3D gaming to the next level. So you can get more done right from the start.<br><br><b>Vivid Visuals</b><br><br>With its advanced architecture and 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM, the ISV-certified NVIDIA Maxwell M520M GPU has the perfect balance of power and battery life - enabling you to be in the field and still get your work done. The extra bright display boasts anti-glare technology and in-plane switching for near-180 degree wide-angle viewing. Add the 720p HD webcam so you can join web conferences and video chats like you're really there.<br><br><b>Key Specifications:</b><br><br>- Intel Core i7-7600U Processor (4M Cache, up to 3.9 GHz)<br>- Windows 10 Pro 64-bit<br>- 15.6" IPS UHD 4K (3840 x 2160) Non-Touch, Anti-Glare Display<br>- 4TB Solid State Drive - 32GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz<br>- NVIDIA Quadro M520M Discrete Graphics w/ 2GB VRAM<br>- Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8265, Bluetooth Version 4.1 w/ Intel vPro Technology<br>- 720p HD Webcam with Mic<br>- Stereo Speakers, Fingerprint Reader, SmartCard Reader<br>- Backlit Keyboard with NumberPad and TrackPoint (Pointing Stick)<br>- I/O Ports: USB-C with Intel Thunderbolt3, 3x USB 3.1 ports (1 Always-on charging), HDMI 1.4b , 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet (RJ-45), Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 Card Reader, Dock Connector / 65-Watt USB Type-C AC-Adapter / 4-Cell Li-Polymer (32Wh) Internal Battery + 6-Cell Li-Ion (48Wh) External (Removable) Battery

items.name: Lenovo ThinkPad P71 Mobile Workstation Laptop - Windows 10 Pro - Intel Xeon E3-1505M, 32GB ECC RAM, 2TB SSD, 17.3" UHD 4K 3840x2160 Display, NVIDIA Quadro P3000 6GB GPU, Color Sensor, SmartCard
items.shortDescription: Intel Xeon E3-1505M v6 Processor (8M Cache, up to 4.0 GHz) - 2TB Solid State Drive - 32GB DDR4 Error-Correcting (ECC) SDRAM, 2400MHz SODIMM - NVIDIA Quadro P3000 Graphics Card 6GB VRAM - 4K Anti-Glare, Non-Touch Screen - Black Color
items.longDescription: <b>Lenovo ThinkPad P71: Redefining Power in a 17.3" Mobile Workstation</b><br><br>The ThinkPad P71 is your mobile option for true, workstation-level performance. From 3D rendering to enhanced multitasking, the P71 gives you the power you need without the bulk. What's more, it's ISV-certified with over 100 apps, and features an expansive selection of ports.<br><br><b>Powerful Processor</b><br><br>Enhanced processors deliver the performance to increase productivity for your business. You can multitask quickly and collaborate wirelessly in a high quality videoconference — all with the convenience of longer battery life. Plus, you can guard against identity theft and ensure safe access to your network with built-in security features.<br><br><b>Award-Winning Keyboard</b><br><br>Full-sized and spill-resistant, the legendary ThinkPad ergonomic keyboard is renowned for its full array of keys, excellent feel, and TrackPoint pointing device.<br><br><b>Key Specifications:</b><br><br>- Intel Xeon E3-1505M v6 Processor (8M Cache, up to 4.0 GHz)<br>- Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Fingerprint Reader, DVD±RW Burner in Optical Bay<br>- 17.3" UHD 4K IPS (3840 x 2160) Anti-Glare, Non-Touch Display<br>- 2TB SSD - 32GB DDR4, Error-Correcting (ECC) RAM, 2400 MHz<br>- NVIDIA Quadro P3000 Graphics with 6GB VRAM <br>- Pantone X-Rite Color Calibration Sensor in Palm Rest<br>- Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8265, Bluetooth Version 4.1<br>- 720p HD Webcam with Dual Array Microphone, Smart Card Reader<br>- Backlit, Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Full Number Pad<br>- I/O Ports: 4x USB 3.1 ports (one Always On), HDMI 1.4b, mini-DisplayPort 1.2a, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet (RJ-45), 2x (Two) USB Type-C / Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 card Reader (SD/SDHC/SDXC), Dock Connector<br>- Mil-Spec Test: MIL-STD-810G military certification | Environmental: EPEAT Gold; ENERGY STAR 6.1; GREENGUARD; RoHS-compliant
